text: tatha jisane kaha apane maata pita seh dhik hai tum donon par! kya mujhe dara rahe ho ki main dharatee se nikaala[1] jaoonga, jabaki bahut-se yug beet gaye[2] isase poorv? aur vo donon duhaee de rahe the allaah keeh tera vinaash ho! too eemaan la! nishchay allaah ka vachan sach hai. to vah kah raha tha ki ye agalon kee kahaaniyaan hain
